p: A β-1,3/1,6-glucan from Durvillaea Antarctica inhibits tumor proliferation and regulates immune expression in vivo studies. According to the studies by Su et al. (2019) the β-1,3/1,6-glucan increases the phagocytic activity of macrophages and the secretion of cytokines and chemokines, modulating the immune response, reducing tumor cells and increasing immune cells.
